comments.text:
To the unseen hater on TYT: I agree with your stance on people dressing up 
animals, but can you blame the animals? It's the owners who don't realize 
the discomfort they put their pets through when they dress them up for a 
few minutes of YT fame. Regarding the video, it's adorable and innocent. 
That's why people watch it. I doubt if you'd ever understand the 
relationship between a pet and a caring owner. The cat is NOT under duress. 
That's how cats play.
comments.author: SYLFan2008

comments.text: That is one cute adorable kitty.

comments.text:
Yeah it is a big deal, because it's super cute and funny. No offense to the 
hater who is complaining about it, but the cat is NOT scared (watch follow 
up videos, cats that don't like it, even when that small, mew and flip 
over, they don't just sit there and play), and it is a super cute and neat 
video. One more thing, that video has over 19 million 100 thousand more 
views than this one, and the only reason this one of yours even has 100k is 
because it's about the kitten tickle video...
